tpObject_list.tpObject: 43,574,454,0,A Chinese king's practice of having a flag carried ahead of him spread across Asia to Europe.
534,571,444,0,Ancient tribes respected the power of the wind and began to carry totem poles with flutters for good luck in battle.
44,649,454,0,Many countries have followed Poland's example and used an eagle on their flags to symbolize strength and power.
534,650,425,0,Heraldic crests and colors combined with a standard rectangular shape to make a symbol with many uses.
43,728,466,0,Early humans lived lives that were vulnerable to disruption by natural forces.
534,729,434,0,Some flags used in Asian countries may have been colored in distinct ways.
